Description: An agent that anayse the tokenomics aspect of a token: token supply; token inflation/deflation trend and prospect; token distibution; token utility and demand analysis; tokenomics index.
Data Used:
1. Token supply
2. Token mint/burn cycle
3. Wallet distribution
4. News article
LLM: Used for token utility and demand analysis
Task boundaries: Limit the analysis only to tokenomics aspect and collect analyse only specific news article that is relevant to the of token demand and utility
Failure Mode: When demand for token is unclear assume the demand is Moving average of last 30 days token circulation

Purpose: Perform technical analysis on inmportant metrics, liquidity, trading volumns, and price movement
Description: An agent  that does technical analysis: Volumn analysis, order book analysis, RSI, Ichimoku Cloud (support and resistance), Parabolic SAR, MACD , Stochastic Oscillator, Bollinger Bands, CVD (Cumulative Volume Delta), Bid/Ask Spread & DepthCrypto Fear & Greed Index,
Data Used:
1. Price 
2. Order book
3. Transactions volume
4. Crypto fear and greed index
LLM: LLM is used to analysis the techincal analysis metrics given and give ouput recommendation of buy/sell and target price.
Failure Mode: Provide recommendation based on rule base at given metrics
Area to improve: Analyse when the agent enter failure mode and identify the reason, then improve

Purpose: Focus on anlysing the onchain data to discover potential sudden/trend shift on the underlying token blockchain.
Description: An agent that network activity, token holder behavior, liqudity pool burn/lock analysis, wallet holders, MEMpool.
Data Used: Blockchain nodes, smart contract events, Transactions/contract calls, state change
Task boundaries: Limit the data only onchain data and DEX

Purpose: Analyse news and/or social media posts to identify current market sentiment
Description: Sentiment news agent to identify market player perception on the token.
Data Used:
1. Social media, forums, chat
2. News sites, official channels, RSS feeds
LLM: Use LLm web serching capability to search relevant news and anlyse the sentiment

Description: Assessing factors such as market volatility, liquidity, and counterparty risks
